inlineContent.text: To build games for the Playdate, you will need to download a Swift toolchain and the Playdate SDK, and then clone and update the configuration of this package.

content.text: Download and install a Swift nightly toolchain

inlineContent.text: Navigate to the Swift.org > Downloads > Snapshots > Trunk Development (main) subsection of the
using your preferred browser.
Select the Xcode “Universal” link to download the latest Swift nightly toolchain.

Open and install the Swift nightly toolchain package. This file should have a name in the format “swift-DEVELOPMENT-SNAPSHOT-202X-XX-XX-a-osx.pkg”. Installing this package requires administrative privileges and may open a password or Touch ID prompt.
You should see the following window if the Swift nightly toolchain was installed successfully:

content.text: Download and install the Playdate SDK

inlineContent.text: Navigate to the Play.date > Dev
using your preferred browser.
Read and agree to the License then check the the “I agree to the Playdate SDK License.” checkmark box. Select “Download Playdate SDK 2.1.1” to download the SDK.
Open and install the Playdate SDK package. Installing this package requires administrative privileges and may open a password or Touch ID prompt.
Installing the Playdate SDK will also install an ARM GCC Toolchain under
, as well as the Xcode Command Line Tools if they are not already present on your host machine.
You should see the following window if the Playdate SDK was installed successfully:
The installed Playdate SDK can be found under

code: C_API                       Designing for Playdate.html Inside Playdate             PlaydateSDK.docset          SDK_LICENSE.md
CoreLibs                    Disk                        Inside Playdate with C.html README.md                   VERSION.txt
Designing for Playdate      Examples                    Inside Playdate.html        Resources                   bin
